description:
1st grader of Mihama academy, the maid of Mihama academy. Except when going to school, taking a bath or swimming, she always wears maid uniform. She said that everyone told her to wear maid uniform as much as possible. Polite and has strong sense of responsibility, she never fail to accomplish any request from others. In her action dictionary, there are only 3 words "receive" - "confirm" - "execute". Because of that reason, sometimes she takes a joke too serious and causes a lot of trouble. Her favorite animal is shark. The shark-shaped pouch which Michiru carries around is made by her.
Her representative fruit is strawberry.
Source: VNDB
name: Komine Sachi
